parameters.name: AutoProvisioningGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the auto provisioning group to be deleted.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the auto provisioning group.

parameters.name: TerminateInstances
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to release instances in the auto provisioning group. Valid values:

*   true: releases instances in the auto provisioning group.
*   false: retains instances in the auto provisioning group.
